bibdata.title: IEEE Guide for Human Factors Applications of Computerized Operating Procedure Systems (COPS) at Nuclear Power Generating Stations and Other Nuclear Facilities
IEEE Guide for Human Factors Applications of Computerized Operating Procedure Systems (COPS) at Nuclear Power Generating Stations and Other Nuclear Facilities

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The application of computerized operating procedure systems (COPS), their design (i.e., form and function), and use is presented in this guide.
The application of computerized operating procedure systems (COPS), their design (i.e., form and function), and use is presented in this guide.
